name: TERRIUS - a SNES retro game - | Pneuma-Studios
name_original: TERRIUS - a SNES retro game - | Pneuma-Studios
description:
Huh, what is this? You've found a dusty SNES cartridge in your drawer... let's find out what ist on it!

This game was made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 3 and it took me 2 days two "complete" it.
